com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

Class ServiceConfigurationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.ServiceConfigurationReader

  • public class ServiceConfigurationReader
extends Object
    Manages all configuration files for a service. On the primary this class will respond to requests for file names and sizes and requests for file fragments.

    • Constructor Summary
